p: Returns a random integer between the two specified values, inclusive.

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: The lower bound of the range

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: The upper bound of the range

returnValue.description: A random integer between a and b, inclusive

p: Returns a random floating point number between 0 (included) and 1 (excluded).

returnValue.description: A random floating point number between 0 and 1

p: Returns a random element from the given sequence.

returnValue.description: A random element from the sequence

p: Returns a list with a random sample of elements from the given sequence.
Elements are sampled with equal probability, unless specific weights are provided.

parameters.name: weights
parameters.description: A sequence of weights, one for each element in the sequence, to determine the probability of sampling each element

parameters.name: cum_weights
parameters.description: A sequence of cumulative weights (to be used as an alternative to weights)

parameters.name: k
parameters.description: The number of elements to sample

returnValue.description: A list with `k` random elements from the sequence

p: Shuffles the elements of the given sequence, mutating the parameter.

parameters.name: sequence
parameters.description: A sequence of elements which itself will be shuffled

p: Returns a list with `k` unique elements sampled from the given sequence.
This is known as 'sampling without replacement'.

parameters.name: k
parameters.description: The number of elements to sample

parameters.name: counts
parameters.description: A sequence of counts, one for each element in the sequence, to determine the number of times each element can be sampled

returnValue.description: A list with `k` random elements from the sequence
